actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to eliminate certain provisions of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act relating to colored oleomargarine.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to eliminate the labeling requirements regarding the wording of oleomargarine and margarine on the packaging of such products. Repeals requirements that public eating places label or shape triangularly such product.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate certain provisions of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act relating to colored oleomargarine.
